                   java.lang.String activity,
                   int numGuests,
                   Timeslot time,
                   java.lang.String date)
        Constructor for Reservation
        Parameters:
        activityList - an ArrayList of the available Activities
        activity - a String with the name of the chosen activity
        numGuests - an integer of the number of guests for the reservation
        time - a TimeSlot object with the time of the reservation
        date - a String containing the date of the reservation
